speech: The fees for our Spa & Ayurveda programs depend on the course type. Shorter programs in Ayurveda therapies are priced lower, while comprehensive spa management certifications are priced higher.

We offer various fee options for each Spa & Ayurveda course. Programs like Ayurvedic therapy sessions are generally lower in cost, while advanced courses like the International Spa Management certificate come at a different rate.

The cost of our Spa & Ayurveda courses depends on the curriculum and duration. Shorter courses in spa therapies have lower fees, while the International Certificate in Spa Management is more comprehensive and has a higher fee.

Our fee structure for Spa & Ayurveda Therapy courses is tailored to each program. For example, introductory Ayurveda courses are more economical, while advanced spa management programs require a higher investment.

Our Spa & Ayurveda Therapy course fees vary based on the duration and specialization. For instance, the International Certificate in Spa Management and the Ayurveda Therapy programs each have different fee.
